Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Skill to control smart home via TapHome application and hardware. You can control lights intensity, temperature, shading and more.

Supported Devices

Thermostat
Alexa, set Thermostat to 20 degrees
Alexa, increase the temperature on Thermostat

Switch
Alexa, turn on switch
Alexa, turn off switch

Analog output
Alexa, turn on dimmer
Alexa, set dimmer to 20 percent
Alexa, increase dimmer by 50 percent
Alexa, lower dimmer

Blinds (with angle)
Alexa, set Blind to 20 percent
Alexa, increase the Blind by 50 percent
Alexa, lower the Blind

Shutters, awning
Alexa, set Awning to 20 percent
Alexa, increase Awning by 50 percent
Alexa, lower Awning

RGB light
Alexa, set the color on RGB Light to Blue
Alexa, turn off RGB Light
Alexa, set RGB Light to 20 percent
Alexa, increase RGB Light by 50 percent


Setup in TapHome app:

- Open Settings -> Expose Devices and select Add new interface. Select Amazon Alexa
- Add devices to be integrated

For more information, check https://taphome.com/support/439943169
